title: What Does Trump Want In Iran?
summary_full: US President Donald Trump's threats to attack Iran provide little detail on what the long-term US goal would be in the event of a sustained or even brief conflict.
summary_public: US President Donald Trump's threats to attack Iran provide little detail on what the long-term US goal would be in the event of a sustained or even brief conflict.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Trump's threats to attack Iran provide little detail
